channel.title: Comments on: Thin Crust Pizza Dough

item.title: By: Bob
item.dc:creator: Bob
item.description: I love the idea of a baking day, and given that we suvirved without an oven for nearly a year (gasp!) I think it should be instated starting now. We had a gas stove that worked fine, but the stove components were electrical so the temp, time etc couldn't be programmed but now we have a new gas stove and my boys love baking too thanks for the inspiration!~Erin
item.content:encoded: I love the idea of a baking day, and given that we suvirved without an oven for nearly a year (gasp!) I think it should be instated starting now. We had a gas stove that worked fine, but the stove components were electrical so the temp, time etc couldn’t be programmed but now we have a new gas stove and my boys love baking too thanks for the inspiration!~Erin
